mapper.sql: f_job_id, f_role, f_party_id, f_name, f_tag, f_initiator_party_id, f_status, f_current_steps, f_current_tasks, f_progress, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_start_time, f_end_time, f_elapsed, f_run_ip
mapper.select: select * from t_job ORDER BY f_create_time desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from t_job
order by ${orderByClause}
limit ${limitClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_job (f_job_id, f_role, f_party_id, f_name, f_tag, f_initiator_party_id, f_status, f_current_steps, f_current_tasks, f_progress, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_start_time, f_end_time, f_elapsed, f_run_ip, f_description, f_roles, f_dsl, f_runtime_conf) values (#{fJobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fInitiatorPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fCurrentSteps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fCurrentTasks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fProgress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fCreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fElapsed,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fRunIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fDescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{fRoles,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{fDsl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{fRuntimeConf,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

update t_job
f_name = #{fName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_tag = #{fTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_initiator_party_id = #{fInitiatorPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_status = #{fStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where f_job_id = #{fJobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and f_role = #{fRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and f_party_id = #{fPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
